body.name: GPS Strong Magnetic Car Vehicle Tracking Anti-Lost Tracker, Multi-Function GPS Mini Locator, Monitoring, Automatic Recording/Voice Activated Callback with App, for Vehicles
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 2 mins
features: Precise positioning, real-time tracking, and the current location of the device can be viewed in real time through the mobile APP. GPS positioning, real-time update, stable signal is not lost, no matter where you are, you can know the precise location of the current device at a glance.No charge for this app

Silicon mark noise reduction, automatic recording, when the sound around the locator is greater than 30 decibels, it will automatically record the sound and upload it to the cloud for storage. Remote listening, real-time viewing, recording and uploading the sound to the cloud through the mobile phone control device, and listening through the APP.

Track playback, you can display the time, speed, track, location, etc. of the device through the track playback function on the APP. (electronic fence/multiple alarm). Small in size, easy to carry, the volume is equivalent to the size of a coin, easy to carry, and can be placed in more places.Sim card not included.

Long-lasting battery life, long standby time, built-in high-energy lithium battery, longer battery life. (Compatible with Micro-USB interface, when the power is lower than 20%, the device will automatically send a low battery alarm to the host to remind charging)

Strong magnetic adsorption, no need to install, built-in strong magnet, direct adsorption and installation, not easy to fall, more convenient to install and use. Various scenarios, easy to deal with, accurate positioning, logistics transportation/fleet supervision/electric motorcycle anti-theft/pet anti-lost/car safety, etc.
body.description: Specification:- FPS Antenna: Built-in passive antenna- Communication method: GPS/LBS- Battery capacity: 500mAh- Voltage range: 3.7-4.2V- Working ambient temperature: -20°C~70°C- GSM frequency band: GSM850/900/1800/1900MHZ- GPS Receiver: High Sensitivity GPS Receiver- Waterproof function: life waterproof- External power supply form: USB- Alarm mode: vibration alarm, power failure alarm, mobile alarm, fence alarm, overspeed alarmPackage Content:1 x Mini Magnetic GPS Tracker1 x USB Charging Cable1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This product comes with no sim card and it doesn't say so in the description!
reviews.reviewText: Why in the hell would you buy a tracker that needs a sim card and states that you don't need a contract to use it but when you use it you have to pay a monthly fee. I would never suggest anyone to buy this tracker because of all their deceptions. I got ripped off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The directions are lacking to say the least. I can't foe the life of me figure out how to change the apn settings to accommodate the sim card. Right now it's no more than a paper. If anyone can it'd be greatly appreciated

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Track your car
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these as gifts after my grandsons car was stolen. I gave them to family and friends that I knew didn't have them. Not sure how they work but they're very happy with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not an American product
reviews.reviewText: The tracker came with instructions to download a foreign app... Super sketchy. Would not recommend to anyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad! Actually works!
reviews.reviewText: This does track without paying for a service. The Android app is not fully written in English though. Some settings were Chinese.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unless you can read Chinese do not buy
reviews.reviewText: Unhelpful instructions printed so small that u need magnifier to read words talk about items that are not I vluded to make device workDO NOT BUY WARNING DO NOT BUY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars All kinds of hidden fees
reviews.reviewText: App plan starts at $15/ month. Ridiculous! Don’t buy it. It’s like a cell phone plan, doesn’t come with a SIM card… that’s extra…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This seemed like a great purchase, but it doesn’t tell you you have to buy a SIM card! For what when you should be able to download the app.
